feature_name: Homepage tagline update and rotating funny footer quotes
scope_summary: Set the homepage lead tagline to the requested copy, reduce prominence of the secondary hero line, and make footer quotes rotate with humor on tab changes and timed intervals.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: Copy and UI behavior update only; no legal-policy surface changed.

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: No data flow or storage scope changed; footer rotation is local DOM text behavior only.
evidence: assets/site.js updates only EASTER_EGGS strings and client-side event listeners
No new fetch endpoints, trackers, or integrations added

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: No new medical claims or scope changes were introduced.

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Simplifying hero messaging reduces cognitive load and rotating novelty text supports engagement without pressure loops.
evidence: index.html removes louder secondary hero tagline line
assets/site.js rotates footer quotes on visibility and focus events

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: No neurodivergence research claims were changed in this patch.

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Users get clearer positioning and livelier footer behavior with negligible risk.
evidence: Homepage lead message now matches requested tagline exactly
Footer no longer repeats one static quote across long sessions

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Updated lines stay aligned to direct, playful brand voice without manipulative phrasing.
evidence: EASTER_EGGS list replaced with intentionally humorous one-liners
Hero copy remains concise and mission-consistent

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Shorter hero stack is easier to scan, and quote updates are non-blocking text changes.
evidence: index.html de-emphasizes secondary hero line via smaller muted text
No keyboard traps or focus behavior regressions introduced

security_and_reliability.rationale: JavaScript syntax validated; rotation logic avoids immediate repeat and initializes once.

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No pricing, upsell, or conversion flow changes were made.

ship_decision.conditions: Ship and visually verify homepage hero and footer quote rotation by switching browser tabs at least twice.
